question:
A client asks his stockbroker to invest $100,000 for maximum annual income, subject to the following conditions: Spread the investment over no more than three different stocks. Put no more than 40 percent of the money into any one stock. Put a minimum of $10,000 into an oil stock. The broker has identified three stocks for investment. Their estimated annual returns per share and price per share are shown in the following Table. 

Table (Estimated annual returns per share and price per share for three stocks):
| Stock Type    | Price per Share | Annual Return per Share |
| ------------- | --------------- | ----------------------- |
| Oil           | $120            | $11                     |
| Auto          | $52             | $4                      |
| Pharmaceutical| $18             | $2                      |
